channel.title: Dementhium issues
channel.description:
ok so im adding summoning, but here are my errors:[code]src\org\dementhium\content\skills\SummoningTrain.java:10: error: class SummonTra in is public, should be declared in a file named SummonTrain.java public class SummonTrain { ^ src\org\dementhium\content\skills\SummoningTrainscroll.java:10: error: class Sum monTrainscroll is public, should be declared in a file named SummonTrainscroll.j ava public class SummonTrainscroll { ^ src\org\dementhium\model\player\Player.java:1633: error: cannot find symbol return bob; ^ symbol: variable bob location: class Player src\org\dementhium\model\player\Player.java:1637: error: cannot find symbol this.bob = bob; ^ symbol: variable bob src\org\dementhium\event\impl\interfaces\InventoryListener.java:1033: error: can not find symbol dropItem(player, slot, itemId); ^ symbol: method dropItem(Player,int,int) location: class InventoryListener 5 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code] for the first one, wtf?
I know how to fix the last 3 but the first 2 wtf..

item.title: Dementhium issues
item.dc:creator: @owns_reece owns reece
item.description:
@owns_reece wrote:

[quote=“ultimateGodz, post:2, topic:476620”]your are missing a simple folder that you need to drop in the action folder. Download this, these are the missing files. https://dl.dropbox.com/u/21554498/summoning.zip

Scan them if you want they are 100% clean.[/quote]
I already have them, at the start of SummonTrain It saysPublic class SummonTrainso i dont see why i am getting those errors

Read full topic

item.title: Dementhium issues
item.dc:creator: @ultimateGodz ultimateGodz
item.description:
@ultimateGodz wrote:

your are missing a simple folder that you need to drop in the action folder. Download this, these are the missing files. https://dl.dropbox.com/u/21554498/summoning.zip

Scan them if you want they are 100% clean.

Read full topic

item.title: Dementhium issues

item.description:
@owns_reece wrote:

ok so im adding summoning, but here are my errors:src\org\dementhium\content\skills\SummoningTrain.java:10: error: class SummonTra in is public, should be declared in a file named SummonTrain.java public class SummonTrain { ^ src\org\dementhium\content\skills\SummoningTrainscroll.java:10: error: class Sum monTrainscroll is public, should be declared in a file named SummonTrainscroll.j ava public class SummonTrainscroll { ^ src\org\dementhium\model\player\Player.java:1633: error: cannot find symbol return bob; ^ symbol: variable bob location: class Player src\org\dementhium\model\player\Player.java:1637: error: cannot find symbol this.bob = bob; ^ symbol: variable bob src\org\dementhium\event\impl\interfaces\InventoryListener.java:1033: error: can not find symbol dropItem(player, slot, itemId); ^ symbol: method dropItem(Player,int,int) location: class InventoryListener 5 errors Press any key to continue . . .
for the first one, wtf?

I know how to fix the last 3 but the first 2 wtf…
